forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
The skies over Downtown San Francisco wear a shroud of lingering clouds, promising both a sense of drama and a touch of coolness as the day unfolds. With temperatures hovering in the mid-60s, a gentle west wind plays through the streets, whispering of the ebb and flow of maritime influences that subtly shape this coastal city. The cloying fog, a signature of San Francisco's charm, may still be trailing along the edges of the Golden Gate, but the forecast's promise of a mostly sunny Saturday hints at moments when the sun will break through, casting a warm and inviting glow. As this afternoon unfolds, expect the clouds to gradually dissipate, revealing spots of blue that will enliven the day.

For those wandering about, a light layer will serve you well against the brisk yet refreshing breezes. Perhaps a stroll through Golden Gate Park, with its sprawling greenery, would harmonize with today’s dynamic atmospheric dance. You might also consider settling at a quiet café, enjoying a warm beverage while watching the world drift by as you savor the singular beauty of a San Francisco afternoon, caught between the embrace of ocean fog and the allure of sunshine.
